From: Frances Werk, To: Bess Chandler Mailed From: Eureka, Illinois on July 31, 1911 Postcard Info: No. D 6484 by F. B. Stumpf & Co., Druggists, Eureka, Ill. Picture Info: Eureka College Campus, Eureka, Ill. Photo only Copyrighted 1908 by F. B. Stumpf

Miss Bess Chandler Pearl, Illinois

Eureka, Ill. Dear Friend, I suppose you are enjoying yourself immensely. I am. Write when you have time. Frances Werk
